title: Emily Knox: Schools and libraries exist to "serve everyone in the community"
description: Emily Knox, an associate professor at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign and the author of “Book Banning in 21st Century America,” joins Chuck to talk about the rise of school board polarization.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: Emily Knox, an associate professor at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign and the author of “Book Banning in 21st Century America,” joins Chuck to talk about the rise of school board polarization.
